thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 16 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Solteq Oyj Q4 Revenue Down At EUR 16.1 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Solteq Oyj Q4 Revenue Down At EUR 16.1 Million
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - SOLTEQ OYJ:
* Q4 REVENUE EUR 16.1 MILLION VERSUS EUR 17.7 MILLION YEAR AGO
* SOLTEQ GROUP‘S ADJUSTED OPERATING PROFIT IN 2018 IS EXPECTED TO GROW SIGNIFICANTLY COMPARED TO FINANCIAL YEAR 2017
* ‍BOARD OF DIRECTORS PROPOSES TO ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING THAT FOR FINANCIAL YEAR 2017, NO DIVIDENDS WILL BE PAID OUT.​
* Q4 OPERATING LOSS EUR 21,000 VERSUS PROFIT EUR 702,000 YEAR AGO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
